survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Autonomous Vehicle Rides
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have experienced autonomous vehicle rides to evaluate their satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with your most recent autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for ease of quantification and analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with your most recent autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing an autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing an autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: Please describe any concerns or issues you experienced during your autonomous vehicle ride.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any concerns or issues you experienced during your autonomous vehicle ride.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use autonomous vehicle rides again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure future usage intent.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use autonomous vehicle rides again in the future?

questions.question_text: Which features of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most appealing? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify popular features. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which features of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most appealing? (Select all that apply)
